name: PLANET FULCRUM \u2013 The game for creative comic book fans
blurb: Create your alter ego, enter in turn-based battle, team with friends, forge arch-enemies, collect and trade items in this online game.

rewards.reward: 1a: DIGITAL REWARD. With this pledge you will receive FULL BETA ACCESS + IN-GAME KICKSTARTER REWARD BADGE

PERSONA REWARD STAGE 1. Your very own HAND-HELD WEAPON OF CHOICE with gold level stat boost. Tell us what you want and we will add them to your persona creation. NOTE: This new tier IS grouped with all higher reward tiers

PERSONA REWARD STAGE 2. Your very own COSTUME ITEM + HAND-HELD WEAPON OF CHOICE with gold level stat boost. Tell us what you want and we will add them to your persona creation. NOTE: This new tier IS grouped with all higher reward tiers

PERSONA REWARD STAGE 3. Your very own HEAD! + COSTUME ITEM + HAND-HELD WEAPON OF CHOICE with gold level stat boost. Take a pic of your face tell us what to add (warpaint, sunglasses, Mohawk) Or send us your own illustration of how you want to look. NOTE: This new tier IS grouped with all higher reward tiers
1b: EARLY BACKER DIGITAL REWARD. With this pledge you will receive an exclusive in-game COLLECTORS DIGITAL KICKSTARTER T-SHIRT for your persona & 250 FULCRA (game currency) + Previous tier

PREMIUM COLLECTORS\r\nEARLY BACKER REWARD. With this pledge \u0003you will receive a PHYSICAL FACTION T-SHIRT (3 to choose from) + PRINTED COPY OF PLANET FULCRUM: FOUNDING DIVIDE (PARTS 1\u20134) + Digital tiers

1c. RESERVATION DIGITAL REWARD. With this pledge you can RESERVE YOUR PERSONA NAME before anyone \u0003else gets it. So hurry! + Previous tiers. NOTE: This pledge is not included with any higher tier bundles.

1d: BRONZE DIGITAL REWARD. With this pledge you will receive the DIGITAL INSIDER BOOK. The digital book (in PDF format) will include concept art, insider game knowledge and battle strategy guide. + Previous tiers

1e. SILVER DIGITAL REWARD. With this pledge \u0003you will receive the first instalment of a NEW, ORIGINAL COMIC BOOK (in PDF format), charting the discovery of PLANET FULCRUM. FOUNDING DIVIDE \u2013 PART 1. + Previous tiers

1f. GOLD DIGITAL REWARD. With this pledge \u0003you will receive the complete saga of the NEW, ORIGINAL COMIC BOOK (in PDF format). FOUNDING DIVIDE \u2013 PARTS 1\u20134. + EXCLUSIVE IN-GAME WEAPON + Previous tiers

2a. COLLECTORS TIER. With this pledge \u0003you will receive a PHYSICAL FACTION T-SHIRT (3 to choose from) + PRINTED COPY OF PLANET FULCRUM: FOUNDING DIVIDE (PARTS 1\u20134) + PRINTED COPY OF THE INSIDER BOOK.\u0003+ Previous Digital tiers

2b. COMIC CON COLLECTORS TIER. With this pledge \u0003you will receive ALL PLANET FULCRUM COMIC CON EXCLUSIVE PARAPHERNALIA including exclusive NYCC T-Shirts \u0003(3 to choose from) and NYCC special edition printed literature. + Previous Digital tiers

3a. BRONZE CREATIVE TIER. With this pledge \u0003you can DESIGN AND NAME AN OUTFIT AND WEAPON RANGE. Brief in our creative team on your \u0003design range for all the PLANET FULCRUM community to acquire. + Digital tiers & Collectors tier 2a

3b. SILVER CREATIVE TIER. With this pledge \u0003you can DESIGN YOUR OWN BESPOKE PERSONA OUTFIT. Brief in our creative team on your design that is exclusive to you! Who knows \u0003what it could eventually fetch in the \u0003trade dock auctions!? + Digital tiers & Collectors tier 2a

3c. LIMITED EDITION CREATIVE TIER. With this pledge \u0003you can have YOUR OWN BESPOKE PERSONA ILLUSTRATED IN STATUE FORM \u0003AND FEATURED IN-GAME AT THE \u0003BATTLEGROUND \u2018PATRONS SANCTUM\u2019.\u0003+ Digital tiers, Collectors tier 2a & Creative tier 3b

3d. GOLD CREATIVE TIER. With this pledge \u0003you can have YOUR PERSONA'S ORIGIN STORYLINE IN A PRINTED COMIC BOOK. Write your persona origin story and we\u2019ll bring it to life in your very own printed comic book. We\u2019ll also distribute your story as an exclusive giveaway at NYCC! + Digital tiers, Collectors tier 2a \u0003& Creative tier 3b

4. COMIC CON LAUNCH TIER. With this pledge \u0003you will have the opportunity to JOIN US AT THE OFFICIAL LAUNCH \u0003OF PLANET FULCRUM AT NYCC.\u0003 Join us and help celebrate the launch. The VIP treatment awaits you and a friend; including flights, accommodation and of course entry to NYCC as our special guests.+ Digital tiers, Collectors tiers \u0003& Creative tier 3b
